meanings.definition: To associate or keep company with others.
meanings.sent1: She companied with her friends at the park.
meanings.sent2: The siblings companied each other to the store.
meanings.sent3: The cat companied with the dog in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: The stars companied the moon in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The birds companied the hiker on the trail.

meanings.definition: A group of people or animals gathered together.
meanings.sent1: The company of friends enjoyed a picnic in the park.
meanings.sent2: A company of ants marched in a straight line.
meanings.sent3: The company of birds chirped loudly in the trees.
meanings.sent4: The company of clouds covered the sky.
meanings.sent5: The company of students worked on a project together.
